author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...NEW EAST PACIFIC TROPICAL STORM DEVELOPS WELL OUT AT SEA...
summary:
...NEW EAST PACIFIC TROPICAL STORM DEVELOPS WELL OUT AT SEA...
 As of 11:00 AM HST Sun Aug 25
 the center of Hector was located near 15.9, -122.5
 with movement W at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hector (EP3/EP082024)
